name: Lúcio
title: Freedom Fighting DJ
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 105 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

abilities.name: Crossfade: Speed Boost
abilities.description: Passively increase the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%. Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

abilities.name: Crossfade: Healing Boost
abilities.description: Passively heal Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 25 health per second. Toggle to play Speed Boost instead.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 114 health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

heroics.name: Sound Barrier
heroics.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Reverse Amp
heroics.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

original.name: Lúcio
original.title: Freedom Fighting DJ
original.description: From the streets of Rio to the clubs on King's Row, Lúcio's beats bring the party to life, and drive the people to action. Now he's on tour in the Nexus, ready to break it down, and to continue fighting for what's right.
original.shortDescription: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Lúcio
baseHeroInfo.title: Freedom Fighting DJ
baseHeroInfo.description: From the streets of Rio to the clubs on King's Row, Lúcio's beats bring the party to life, and drive the people to action. Now he's on tour in the Nexus, ready to break it down, and to continue fighting for what's right.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A sustained Healer who gives his team mobility and peels enemies off allies.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Wall Ride
trait.description: When moving alongside impassable battleground terrain and Structures, Lúcio can walk through other units and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%. This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 105 damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Play one of two music tracks for Lúcio and his allies. Healing Boost: Passively heal Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 health per second. Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 114 health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

heroicAbilities.name: Sound Barrier
heroicAbilities.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Reverse Amp
heroicAbilities.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%. This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Crossfade
otherAbilities.description: Currently playing Speed Boost, increasing the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%. Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

otherAbilities.name: Skate Mode
otherAbilities.description: Lúcio can shoot while moving. Lúcio skates or dies!

skins.name: Freedom Fighting DJ
skins.description: From the streets of Rio to the clubs on King's Row, Lúcio's beats bring the party to life, and drive the people to action. Now he's on tour in the Nexus, ready to break it down, and to continue fighting for what's right.

skins.name: Soundblast Lúcio
skins.description: Vishkar's sonic technology was a good starting point, but the pursuit of perfection in sound quality demands keeping up to date with the latest in audio equipment.
